1364280.name: The Kalalau Trail
1364280.description: Video game version of the famous Kalalau Trail on the island of Kauai. Walk the Kalalau Trail all the way from the start, at the end of road at Ke'e Beach, to Hanakapi'ai Beach, inland to Hanakapi'ai Falls, and then onward to Hanakoa Camp and Kalalau Valley and the Beach. Find and recycle all the discarded water bottles to complete the trek.
1364280.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
